channel.title: 562 Issues
channel.description:
Operating System: Windows Vista Home Premium Upgraded To Window 7 Home Premium. Server Type: 562 Issue #1: How do i play hd in the 562? i tried clicking hd in all sizes but it say "Unable to enter that mode" In client run.bat it says this: [code]java.lang.RuntimeException: at Class130_Sub2.<init>(Class130_Sub2.java:2099) at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Sou rce) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source) at Class44.method538(Class44.java:638) at Class130.method1157(Class130.java:50) at Login.method1154(Login.java:642) at Class131_Sub2_Sub38.method1644(Class131_Sub2_Sub38.java:114) at Class168.method2435(Class168.java:4825) at Class168.method2436(Class168.java:5635) at Class168.method2437(Class168.java:5640) at PacketParser.method1581(PacketParser.java:993) at client.method43(client.java:694) at Applet_Sub1.method41(Applet_Sub1.java:317) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:799) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] Issue #2: I made my character right to 4 on the server but everytime i type in a command like ::gw it says [code]Use the reverse apostrophe[/code] Issue #3: How come sometimes when you lo g on, it says loading but never comes on? its really irratating? how can i fix it? Thanks guys!

item.title: 562 Issues
item.dc:creator: @pro_banana pro banana
item.description:
@pro_banana wrote:

if your azerty like me use shift + alt so you can switch to qwerty.

Read full topic

item.title: 562 Issues
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

Try using khanz 562 ipchanger client, and be sure that the source you got has HD. + Use the admin-console by pressing that button under ESC.

item.title: 562 Issues
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Operating System:
Windows Vista Home Premium Upgraded To Window 7 Home Premium.
Server Type: 562
Issue #1:
How do i play hd in the 562? i tried clicking hd in all sizes but it say “Unable to enter that mode”
In client run.bat it says this:

[code]java.lang.RuntimeException:
at Class130_Sub2.(Class130_Sub2.java:2099)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)

    at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)

    at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Sou

rce)
at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at Class44.method538(Class44.java:638)
at Class130.method1157(Class130.java:50)
at Login.method1154(Login.java:642)
at Class131_Sub2_Sub38.method1644(Class131_Sub2_Sub38.java:114)
at Class168.method2435(Class168.java:4825)
at Class168.method2436(Class168.java:5635)
at Class168.method2437(Class168.java:5640)
at PacketParser.method1581(PacketParser.java:993)
at client.method43(client.java:694)
at Applet_Sub1.method41(Applet_Sub1.java:317)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:799)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/code]
Issue #2:
I made my character right to 4 on the server but everytime i type in a command like ::gw it says

Use the reverse apostrophe

Issue #3:
How come sometimes when you lo g on, it says loading but never comes on? its really irratating? how can i fix it?
Thanks guys!

Read full topic
